title: Midnight Horror School
synopsis: The school has 26 students with each name of them beginning with a letter of the alphabet in order and a color, 3 teachers, 3 classrooms, a library, a cafeteria, a music room, a playroom, a fountain, a skeleton playground, a graveyard and several school staff.
staff: [['Iwata, Naomi', ['Director', ' Original Creator']], ['Asai, Shingo', ['Director']], ['Shimizu, Youji', ['Sound Director']], ['Kondou, Hiroaki', ['Music']]]
